game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact from the ancient ruins.
game.description: Queen Aerin has ordered the retrieval of a lost artifact, which is believed to be in the forgotten ancient ruins. It is said that the artifact holds immense power and could be a great help to your kingdom.

task.description: Find and secure the ancient map, which reveals the location of the ancient ruins.
Follow the ancient map to locate and explore the ancient ruins.
Overcome the traps and challenges in the ruins to retrieve the lost artifact.
